attributes.review:
because of this app I was HACKED!!! I downloaded it to see what it could be about and it SLOWED DOWN MY PHONE so much!!

My phone is RUINED! Slower than a snail in a desert. Because of this terrible app I keep getting fraud emails. Hackers are trying to STEAL my information. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!!!!!!!!!!
attributes.title: I WAS HACKED

attributes.review: What I really hate is how the app shuts itself off every 30 seconds. How can anyone expect me to consume every tweet he writes if I can’t see it?! disappointed... this is the first time he’s ever let me down.
attributes.title: SAD.

attributes.review: Terrible app it doesn’t work half the time and whenever I try to open it, it doesn’t ever open i’m so sad because I wish the app icon was Trump 2020✨🥰🧚‍♀️ but on a gravestone😘❤️🥰🧚‍♀️
attributes.title: App wouldn’t ever open

attributes.review: There are many problems with this app, but the worst part of it is that it supports a racist, sexist, homophobic, rapist man that looks like a dried up Cheeto. I hope the Simpsons were right about this one. 🤩🥳🧚‍♂️Trump 2020😻🤪✨but on a gravestone 🌟😋😚
attributes.title: This is the worst app I’ve ever had

attributes.review: I thought this app was going to help me know what the campaign looked like but it just keeps requesting me to sign a birthday card for a bunker baby.  I dont know this baby and he scares me.  Please what are the campaign details
attributes.title: Horrible

attributes.review: My phones been glitching ever since I got this app? It’s like a virus has taken over and really I’m gonna have to throw my whole phone away. Dear lord trumps costing me money, where’s my stimulus check anyway? 🤬🤬🤬
attributes.title: High hopes

attributes.review:
This app is full of false narratives. I try to be unbiased but it’s just too much. 

Also, my phone got a virus and my bank account got hacked shortly after putting my information in. Unacceptable. LAW & ORDER.
attributes.title: Propaganda

attributes.review: I downloaded this app and it turned out to be a place to date married Russian women online. I think it’s a cover up for babushka porn I don’t know what kind of weirdo would ever want this app.
attributes.title: Fake!! Do not download

attributes.review:
I was interested but not in getting texts. 
The app doesn’t allow you to bypass this prompt. Disappointed.
attributes.title: Forcing me to give my cell phone number
